item.title: Google Pub/Sub with dead letter queues
item.description:
Today we will build a simple system with Google Pub/Sub to explore the basic components needed for an asynchronous publisher-subscriber pattern. We will use Terraform for creating the infrastucture, and go for the application code. All code here.

At the end of this post, you should know

  • What is a topic?
  • What is a subscription?
  • Why do I need a dead letter queue?
  • How do I retry message from my dead letter queue?

item.title: Running Google Pub/Sub locally
item.description:
I have recently started using Google’s event queue “Cloud Pub/Sub” for a few projects at work, and I enjoyed how straightforward it is to configure and use in production. Their documentation is usually great, but often misses how to tie everything for your local environment.

Here is a quick guide how I set up my integration test locally using the Pub/Sub emulator. Code examples are written in Go.
